name: e3-monorepo
description: East Execution Engine - Monorepo for e3 packages

scripts.build: npm run build -w @elaraai/e3-types && npm run build -w @elaraai/e3 && npm run build -w @elaraai/e3-core && npm run build -w @elaraai/e3-api-client && npm run build -w @elaraai/e3-cli && npm run build -w @elaraai/e3-api-server && npm run build -w @elaraai/e3-api-tests && npm run build -w e3-integration-tests && npm run build -w e3-fuzz
